securityInfo.title: Vault Security
securityInfo.summary: Your data is encrypted and stored only on this device.
securityInfo.detailAes: AES-256-GCM: 256-bit symmetric encryption with authentication tag. Ensures both confidentiality and integrity of your data.
securityInfo.detailArgon2id: Argon2id: Winner of the Password Hashing Competition (2015). Memory-hard algorithm that resists GPU and ASIC brute-force attacks.
securityInfo.detailX25519: X25519: Elliptic curve Diffie-Hellman key exchange. Industry standard for secure key agreement.
securityInfo.detailMlKem: ML-KEM-1024: NIST post-quantum standard (FIPS 203). Protects your data against future quantum computers.
securityInfo.detailLocal: All cryptographic operations run locally — no network, no cloud, no telemetry.
